verses.name: Leviticus 26:25
verses.text: And I will bring a sword upon you, that shall avenge the quarrel of my covenant: and when ye are gathered together within your cities, I will send the pestilence among you; and ye shall be delivered into the hand of the enemy.

verses.name: Leviticus 26:26
verses.text: And when I have broken the staff of your bread, ten women shall bake your bread in one oven, and they shall deliver you your bread again by weight: and ye shall eat, and not be satisfied.

verses.name: Leviticus 26:27
verses.text: And if ye will not for all this hearken unto me, but walk contrary unto me;
